text: Lead a technical team of 4, ensuring seamless product integration.

children.text: Own microservices for client metadata retrieval, schema mapping, and call inflow.
Integration Methods: API Poll, Webhook, SFTP, Batch Processes, VPN Auth, On-Prem deployment.

text: Leading architectural initiatives to enhance the core product's performance.

children.text: Enhanced robustness and monitoring capabilities through the implementation of daily reports, alerts and automated recovery processes.
Implemented innovative blob-storage solutions to address concurrency and space-related challenges in SFTP operations.
Ensuring product security through the implementation of industry-leading security practices.
Actively involved in the migration of AWS managed services (Lambda, S3) to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure to achieve greater control and cost savings by upto 50%.
Exploring alternatives for Dynamo DB and AWS SQS to optimise efficiency.

text: Independently managing pre-sales technical discussions with clients.

children.text: Architecting strategic solutions for integrating our product into diverse client product architectures.
